1.name: Dazzling Entrance
1.desc: When Billy hits an enemy with a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</ct>, he gains an additional 2.7 Energy. Can trigger once every 5s.

flavor.0: "You guys are way too honest to be bad guys!"
flavor.1: "All lined up, like NPCs at the shooting range!"

2.name: Roaming Gunslinger
2.desc: Billy's <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</ct> DMG increases by 25%. Rolling Shots during his <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attacks</ct> count as dodges, making Billy Invulnerable during skill activation and able to trigger <ct color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodges</ct>. When a Rolling Shot triggers a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</ct>, it will automatically follow up with a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</ct>.

flavor.0: "The Starlight Knights never run from danger. That's what we call tactical repositioning for better aim!"
flavor.1: â€” User "Dreamgirl Monica" from the Starlight Radiance messageboards.

3.name: Teachings of the Starlight Knights
3.desc: <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct>, and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> Lv. +2
3.flavor: Never neglect your training, and never stop improving! This is the philosophy of the Starlight Knights. Billy believes in it wholeheartedly, and practices it sincerely.

4.name: Starlight Ballistics
4.desc: When Billy hits an enemy with his <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct>, the skill's CRIT Rate increases based on the distance from the enemy. The closer he is to the target, the greater the effect, up to a maximum increase of 32%.

flavor.0: These explosive bullets of Billy's own invention are incredibly lethal at close range.
flavor.1: Their performance far outstrips Billy's original intention of simply making them cooler.

5.name: Lost Technological Construct
5.desc: <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct>, and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> Lv. +2
5.flavor: Unknown precision components and unique structural design have given Billy performance far beyond his peers... And maintenance costs far beyond his means.

6.name: Starlight Hero
6.desc: When Billy accumulates 10 hits on enemies or triggers a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</ct>, his DMG increases by 6%, stacking up to 5 times and lasting until he's knocked back or launched by an attack.
